backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing access control, user profiles, song management, likes, plays, favorites, and playlist storage with admin‑artist permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of many frontend files including components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining light/dark modes and global styles using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading main React bundle and PWA metadata.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and launch behavior.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling caching for app shell and audio files with separate caches and offline behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app managing navigation, providers, deep links, welcome popup, sign‑in modal, and screen rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminOnly.t: Components that conditionally render or disable children based on admin status, with optional fallback or tooltip.
frontend/src/components/branding/AppHead: Sticky header displaying the app logo and title with a simple visual layout.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeChannel: Admin‑editable home banner allowing image upload, URL input, and clearing, with display of the channel image and title.
Main app layout including sidebar, header, content area, bottom tabs, and optional starfield background.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Playlist panel that loads user playlists, handles playlist creation, and prompts unauthenticated users to sign in.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryT: Tabs for switching between the songs and playlists views in the library section.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Bottom navigation bar for switching screens with active tab highlighting and optional desktop display.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Sideb: Sidebar with navigation links, mobile sheet mode, and an option to trigger PWA install.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/First: Popup offering guest mode or Internet Identity sign‑in, with handlers for login and dismissal.
frontend/src/components/player/MusicPlay: Audio player handling playback, seeking, volume, play count incrementing, and song navigation.
frontend/src/components/pwa/A2HSBanner.t: Banner prompting users to install the PWA, with session‑based hide logic.
frontend/src/components/SignInModal.tsx: Sign-in modal/drawer that triggers Internet Identity login and handles mobile vs desktop layouts.
frontend/src/components/songs/CreatePlay: Dialog or drawer allowing authenticated users to create a playlist and add the current song.
frontend/src/components/songs/DownloadCh: Dialog offering offline caching or device download options for a song.
frontend/src/components/songs/Horizontal: Compact song card showing artwork, play button, metadata, and overflow actions.
Horizontal scrollable row layout for grouping song cards with a section title.
frontend/src/components/songs/PlaylistCh: Dialog for adding or removing a song from user playlists with auth handling.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongCard.t: Displays a clickable song card with artwork, play/delete controls, engagement bar, and overflow menu.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongEditor: Admin-only dialog for adding songs, handling file uploads, field validation, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongEngage: Shows like and play counts with an optional like button that triggers engagement mutations.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongListRo: Renders a compact row-style song item with image, play button, engagement bar, and optional delete action.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongOverfl: Provides a mobile/desktop overflow menu for actions like favoriting, playlist management, downloads, and sharing.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongsSortB: Dropdown bar allowing users to sort songs by latest, most liked, or most heard.
frontend/src/components/visual/Starfield: Generates an animated starfield background in dark theme, respecting reduced animation settings.
frontend/src/config/featureFlags.ts: Defines feature flags, currently enabling desktop bottom tab bar.
frontend/src/context/AdminContext.tsx: Context provider exposing admin status and loading state using useIsAdmin.
frontend/src/context/AuthContext.tsx: Provides auth state, pending action handling, and soft sign‑in modal control including scroll/return path preservation.
frontend/src/hooks/useA2HS.ts: Handles PWA install prompts by capturing the beforeinstallprompt event and exposing an install trigger.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstLaunchWelcome: Tracks and displays a first‑launch welcome screen using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeBanner.ts: Manages a customizable home banner image with localStorage persistence and file validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Wraps Dfinity AuthClient to manage Internet Identity login, identity restoration, and related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries backend to determine if the authenticated user is an admin/artist and caches the result.
frontend/src/hooks/useLikedSongs.ts: Provides quick lookup of liked songs using favorites data and the current user's authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Exposes responsive media query matching and a helper for mobile detection.
frontend/src/hooks/usePendingAction.ts: Executes queued user actions after authentication, supporting likes, playlist edits, offline caching, and downloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, adding, deleting, searching, and interacting with songs, including blob handling and error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Implements a settings context with persistence in localStorage and options for audio quality, animations, effects, and notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useSongEngagement.ts: Wraps like and play interactions with auth checks, triggering authentication when required.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Provides a theme context with light/dark mode support stored in localStorage and applied to the document root.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark CSS variables, global styles, and reduced-animation rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutArtistScreen.tsx: Renders an about page with artist info and external links to social platforms.
frontend/src/pages/ContactScreen.tsx: Displays a contact page with a description and email link for inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/CustomSongRequestsScr: Shows a page explaining custom song requests with links for support and email contact.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Home page showing song lists, music player, song deletion, and sections for new and top songs.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryScreen.tsx: Displays the user's library with songs, favorites, playlists, and a music player, handling authentication and song navigation.
frontend/src/pages/SearchScreen.tsx: Provides keyword-based song search with results listing and an integrated music player.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsScreen.tsx: Renders user-configurable settings for audio quality, visual effects, and notifications.
frontend/src/pages/SongsScreen.tsx: Shows all songs with sorting, admin deletion, deep link handling, and a music player.
frontend/src/pages/SupportScreen.tsx: Displays donation information and a link to support the project.
frontend/src/pages/ThemesScreen.tsx: Allows selecting between light and dark themes with visual previews.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load for PWA functionality.
frontend/src/utils/authorizationErrors.t: Parses backend authorization errors and provides user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/dataUrl.ts: Provides helpers to detect data URLs and convert them to byte arrays.
frontend/src/utils/deepLinks.ts: Builds, parses, and clears song deep‑link URL parameters using query or hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Validates audio URLs, creates safe filenames, and triggers browser downloads for song audio.
frontend/src/utils/offlineAudioCache.ts: Manages caching, checking, removing, and clearing audio files for offline playback using the Cache API.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Provides Web Share API helpers and clipboard fallback utilities for sharing song links or text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including sessionStorage-backed retrieval.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, requirements, UI rules, and architectural notes for MVRIO Night.
